responses: Hi there, how can I help?

Malla Reddy College of Engineering & Technology (MRCET) is a constituent College of Malla Reddy Group of Institutions (MRGI) established in 2004.
you can call me mrcet bot

patterns: what are the timings of college
what are the courses offered in mrcet
tell me about the courses offered in mrcet
give me the list of courses in mrcet
responses: The College offers Engineering courses (B.Tech.) in AE, CSE, CSE(AI&ML), CSE(CS), CSE(IOT), CSE(DS), AI&ML, AI&DS, ECE, EEE, IT, MECH disciplines and Post Graduate (M.Tech.) courses in ECE, CSE, MECH and AE specializations in addition to MBA programmes.
